adobeId_1.title: Adobe Experience Platform ID-1
adobeId_1.description: Enter the First ID from your Adobe Experience Platform. eg, if your script is 'https://assets.adobedtm.com/8s8wwe70yyu7/hui6t3fe6y9o/launch-er45i4b9pp90-development.min.js', then the First ID should be '8s8wwe70yyu7'

adobeId_2.title: Adobe Experience Platform ID-2
adobeId_2.description: Enter the Second ID from your Adobe Experience Platform. eg, if your script is 'https://assets.adobedtm.com/8s8wwe70yyu7/hui6t3fe6y9o/launch-er45i4b9pp90-development.min.js', then the Second ID should be 'hui6t3fe6y9o'

adobeId_3.title: Adobe Experience Platform ID-3
adobeId_3.description: Enter the Second ID from your Adobe Experience Platform. eg, if your script is 'https://assets.adobedtm.com/8s8wwe70yyu7/hui6t3fe6y9o/launch-er45i4b9pp90-development.min.js', then the Second ID should be 'launch-er45i4b9pp90-development.min.js'
